Detailed Description

This file contains structures, function prototypes and macros related to the sending and receiving of arbitrary data streams through the device's data pipes when the library is initialized in USB host mode.

Note:
This file should not be included directly. It is automatically included as needed by the USB driver dispatch header located in LUFA/Drivers/USB/USB.h.
